trans-unit.source: Understand and resolve WebHCat errors on HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Understand and resolve WebHCat errors on HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Learn how to about common errors returned by WebHCat on HDInsight and how to resolve them.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to about common errors returned by WebHCat on HDInsight and how to resolve them.

trans-unit.source: Understand and resolve errors received from WebHCat (Templeton,) on HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Understand and resolve errors received from WebHCat (Templeton,) on HDInsight

trans-unit.source: When using WebHCat (formerly known as Templeton,) to work with HDInsight, you may receive errors.
trans-unit.target: When using WebHCat (formerly known as Templeton,) to work with HDInsight, you may receive errors.

trans-unit.source: This document provides guidance on common errors – why they occur and what you can do to resolve them.
trans-unit.target: This document provides guidance on common errors – why they occur and what you can do to resolve them.

trans-unit.source: What is WebHCat?
trans-unit.target: What is WebHCat?

trans-unit.source: [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) is a REST API for [HCatalog](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HCatalog), a table and storage management layer for Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) is a REST API for [HCatalog](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/HCatalog), a table and storage management layer for Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: WebHCat is enabled by default on HDInsight clusters, and is used by various tools to submit jobs, get job status, etc. without logging in to the cluster.
trans-unit.target: WebHCat is enabled by default on HDInsight clusters, and is used by various tools to submit jobs, get job status, etc. without logging in to the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Modifying configuration
trans-unit.target: Modifying configuration

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Several of the errors listed in this document occur because a configured maximum has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Several of the errors listed in this document occur because a configured maximum has been exceeded.

trans-unit.source: When the resolution step mentions that you can change a value, you must use one of the following to perform the change:
trans-unit.target: When the resolution step mentions that you can change a value, you must use one of the following to perform the change:

trans-unit.source: For **Windows** clusters: Use a script action to configure the value during cluster creation.
trans-unit.target: For **Windows** clusters: Use a script action to configure the value during cluster creation.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Develop script actions](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Develop script actions](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md).

trans-unit.source: For **Linux** clusters: Use Ambari (web or REST API) to modify the value.
trans-unit.target: For **Linux** clusters: Use Ambari (web or REST API) to modify the value.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Manage HDInsight using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Manage HDInsight using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md)

trans-unit.source: Default configuration
trans-unit.target: Default configuration

trans-unit.source: The following are default configuration values that can impact WebHCat performance, or cause errors if these values are exceeded:
trans-unit.target: The following are default configuration values that can impact WebHCat performance, or cause errors if these values are exceeded:

trans-unit.source: Setting
trans-unit.target: Setting

trans-unit.source: What it does
trans-unit.target: What it does

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: Default value

trans-unit.source: yarn.scheduler.capacity.maximum-applications
trans-unit.target: yarn.scheduler.capacity.maximum-applications

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of jobs that can be active concurrently (pending or running)
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of jobs that can be active concurrently (pending or running)

trans-unit.source: templeton.exec.max-procs
trans-unit.target: templeton.exec.max-procs

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of requests that can be served concurrently
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of requests that can be served concurrently

trans-unit.source: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms
trans-unit.target: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms

trans-unit.source: The number of days that job history will be retained
trans-unit.target: The number of days that job history will be retained

trans-unit.source: 7 days
trans-unit.target: 7 days

trans-unit.source: Too many requests
trans-unit.target: Too many requests

trans-unit.source: **HTTP Status code**: 429
trans-unit.target: **HTTP Status code**: 429

trans-unit.source: Cause
trans-unit.target: Cause

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: You have exceeded the maximum concurrent requests served by WebHCat per minute (default 20)
trans-unit.target: You have exceeded the maximum concurrent requests served by WebHCat per minute (default 20)

trans-unit.source: Reduce your workload to ensure that you do not submit more than the maximum number of concurrent requests or increase the concurrent request limit by modifying `templeton.exec.max-procs`.
trans-unit.target: Reduce your workload to ensure that you do not submit more than the maximum number of concurrent requests or increase the concurrent request limit by modifying `templeton.exec.max-procs`.

trans-unit.source: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information
trans-unit.target: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information

trans-unit.source: Server unavailable
trans-unit.target: Server unavailable

trans-unit.source: **HTTP Status code**: 503
trans-unit.target: **HTTP Status code**: 503

trans-unit.source: Cause
trans-unit.target: Cause

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: This usually occurs during failover between the primary and secondary HeadNode for the cluster
trans-unit.target: This usually occurs during failover between the primary and secondary HeadNode for the cluster

trans-unit.source: Wait two minutes, then retry the operation
trans-unit.target: Wait two minutes, then retry the operation

trans-unit.source: Bad request Content: Could not find job
trans-unit.target: Bad request Content: Could not find job

trans-unit.source: **HTTP Status code**: 400
trans-unit.target: **HTTP Status code**: 400

trans-unit.source: Cause
trans-unit.target: Cause

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: Job details have been cleaned up by the job history cleaner
trans-unit.target: Job details have been cleaned up by the job history cleaner

trans-unit.source: The default retention period for job history is 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The default retention period for job history is 7 days.

trans-unit.source: This can be changed by modifying `mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms`.
trans-unit.target: This can be changed by modifying `mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms`.

trans-unit.source: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information
trans-unit.target: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information

trans-unit.source: Job has been killed due to a failover
trans-unit.target: Job has been killed due to a failover

trans-unit.source: Retry job submission for up to two minutes
trans-unit.target: Retry job submission for up to two minutes

trans-unit.source: An Invalid job id was used
trans-unit.target: An Invalid job id was used

trans-unit.source: Check if the job id is correct
trans-unit.target: Check if the job id is correct

trans-unit.source: Bad gateway
trans-unit.target: Bad gateway

trans-unit.source: **HTTP Status code**: 502
trans-unit.target: **HTTP Status code**: 502

trans-unit.source: Cause
trans-unit.target: Cause

trans-unit.source: Resolution
trans-unit.target: Resolution

trans-unit.source: Internal garbage collection is occurring within the WebHCat process
trans-unit.target: Internal garbage collection is occurring within the WebHCat process

trans-unit.source: Wait for garbage collection to finish or restart the WebHCat service
trans-unit.target: Wait for garbage collection to finish or restart the WebHCat service

trans-unit.source: Timeout waiting on a response from the ResourceManager service.
trans-unit.target: Timeout waiting on a response from the ResourceManager service.

trans-unit.source: This can occur when the number of active applications goes the configured maximum (default 10,000)
trans-unit.target: This can occur when the number of active applications goes the configured maximum (default 10,000)

trans-unit.source: Wait for currently running jobs to complete or increase the concurrent job limit by modifying `yarn.scheduler.capacity.maximum-applications`.
trans-unit.target: Wait for currently running jobs to complete or increase the concurrent job limit by modifying `yarn.scheduler.capacity.maximum-applications`.

trans-unit.source: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information
trans-unit.target: See [Modifying configuration](#modifying-configuration) for more information

trans-unit.source: When attempting to retrieve all jobs through the [GET /jobs](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat+Reference+Jobs) call while `Fields` is set to `*`
trans-unit.target: When attempting to retrieve all jobs through the [GET /jobs](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat+Reference+Jobs) call while `Fields` is set to `*`

trans-unit.source: Do not retrieve *all* job details, instead use `jobid` to retrieve details for jobs only greater than certain job id.
trans-unit.target: Do not retrieve *all* job details, instead use `jobid` to retrieve details for jobs only greater than certain job id.

trans-unit.source: Or, do not use `Fields`
trans-unit.target: Or, do not use `Fields`

trans-unit.source: The WebHCat service is down during HeadNode failover
trans-unit.target: The WebHCat service is down during HeadNode failover

trans-unit.source: Wait for two minutes and retry the operation
trans-unit.target: Wait for two minutes and retry the operation

trans-unit.source: There are more than 500 pending jobs submitted through WebHCat
trans-unit.target: There are more than 500 pending jobs submitted through WebHCat

trans-unit.source: Wait until currently pending jobs have completed before submitting more jobs
trans-unit.target: Wait until currently pending jobs have completed before submitting more jobs

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
